name: Freewaters Freeland Travel Slip On Shoes - Men's
description:
Sleek slip-on sneakers that offer sandal like freedom. Combing a soft and breathable sock-like upper with sandal-like straps, the Freeland Travel shoe delivers incredible comfort and support.Breathable knit upper hugs you foot like a sock, with straps to tuune the fit.Supreem Foam midsole offers long-lasting comfort and plenty of rebound.Foam is made from 10-15% recycled materials.Grippy rubber tread.e.dye® Waterless Colour System™ uses 75% less water, fewer chemicals and emits less CO2 than traditional dyeing methods.Responsibly sourced leather from tanneries where 100% of the water used is naturally filtered by onsite wetlands.PVC-free construction uses water-based adhesives instead of solvents.Every pair of Freewaters sold helps support their global water initiatives, helping provide safe, clean drinking water for all. Since their 2011 launch Freewaters has 85 clean water projects around the globe.

        Sustainability
